mapper.select: SELECT s.movie_name, s.theater_id, s.screen_id, s.start_time, s.schedule_date, t.theater_name, sc.screen_name, t.theater_do, m.start_date AS start_date -- TO_DATE 제거 FROM schedule s JOIN theater t ON s.theater_id = t.theater_id JOIN screen sc ON s.screen_id = sc.screen_id JOIN movie m ON m.movie_name = s.movie_name ORDER BY t.theater_id, s.movie_name
